entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
